hooks.command: powershell -NoProfile -WindowStyle Hidden -Command "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoProfile -WindowStyle Hidden -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ""$env:CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR\.claude\scripts\timeout-monitor.ps1"" -TimestampFile ""$env:CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR\.claude\.timeout-state"" -SessionId ""$env:CLAUDE_SESSION_ID""' -WindowStyle Hidden"
hooks.description: Inicia monitor de timeout de inatividade em background

hooks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object {$_.Path -like '*powershell*' -and $_.CommandLine -like '*timeout-monitor.ps1*'} | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item '$env:CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR\.claude\.timeout-state' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
hooks.description: Para monitor de timeout e limpa arquivo de estado
